articles.title: Samsung’s Galaxy Watch 7 delivers Wear OS 5 and health tracking upgrades from $299 - 9to5Google
articles.description: Samsung has announced the Galaxy Watch 7, its latest Wear OS smartwatch which delivers a handful of small upgrades over its predecessor.
articles.content: Samsung is now ready to unveil the next in its long-standing smartwatch series the Galaxy Watch 7 and Watch 7 Ultra, with the series delivering welcome upgrades and staying at the same price point.l… [+1883 chars]
